abilities.name: Beam
about: Creates a laser beam on a player until player goes out of sight or out of range

abilities.name: Warp
about: At the end of channeled warp, player gets teleported to equivalent warp in targeted location

abilities.name: Summon Skeleton
about: Encounter creates new monsters to aid said encounter

abilities.name: Offering of Judgement
about: Creates an untargettable totem that leaves a damaging pool nearby it's spawn

abilities.name: Mortar
about: Fires projectile that does damage on impact and when the projectile explodes
